answers.answer: Hello,do you have diabetes?  If so, getting your blood sugars normal iis critical to managing any complications.Are you able to exercise.  Even walking would be helpful to improving strenght.You should ask your doctor about appropriate medications.Best wishes

question: When I lift  anything weighing about 10 - 15 pounds, my legs feel like they are going to collapse.  I also have trouble sleeping at night due to restless leg syndrome.  What are possible causes?
title: Leg Problems
